meanings.definition: A basketball player who can play both the shooting guard and small forward positions.
meanings.sent1: The swingman scored a three-pointer in the game.
meanings.sent2: The coach decided to put the swingman in to defend against the opponent's best player.
meanings.sent3: The swingman tried to dunk the ball but ended up missing and hitting the backboard instead.
meanings.sent4: In the heat of the game, the swingman moved swiftly between offense and defense like a skilled acrobat.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as the swingman made a crucial steal in the final seconds of the match.

meanings.definition: A versatile athlete who can play multiple positions on a sports team.
meanings.sent1: During the tournament, the swingman showcased his ability to adapt to different roles on the field.
meanings.sent2: The team captain praised the swingman for his flexibility and teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The swingman jokingly suggested playing all positions at once to confuse the opponents.
meanings.sent4: His performance on the field proved that he was indeed a swingman, seamlessly transitioning between roles.
meanings.sent5: The coach relied on the swingman's adaptability to fill in wherever the team needed him most.
